title: AMS Simulation and Methodology - CAD Engineer (m, f, d)
summary: Imagine what you could do here. At Apple, new ideas have a way of becoming extraordinary products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish. Dynamic, amazing people and inspiring, innovative technologies are the norm here. The people who work here have reinvented entire industries with all Apple Hardware products. The same passion for innovation that goes into our products also applies to our practices strengthening our commitment to leave the world better than we found it.
preferred_qualifications:
Ability to use industry-standard mixed-signal simulation tools, including Cadence - Xcelium (Incisive), SimVision, AMS Designer; Synopsys - VCS, Verdi; Mentor – Symphony, Questa
Experience with AMS simulation techniques, including discipline resolution, binding, IE setup, Connect Modules, AMSD block, wreal, TCL probes, real number modeling, UDNs, etc.
Exposure to industry-standard analog simulation tools, including Cadence Spectre, Synopsys PrimeSim, Mentor AFS
Proficient in Linux and programming, particularly Python3
Familiar in data structures and algorithms
Strong problem solving and interpersonal skills
